sn22.43:1.2: This was famously one of the last teachings of the Buddha (DN 16:2.26.1).
sn22.43:1.3: Compare the Bodhisatta’s reflection at SN 12.10. | Readings vary, but surely for yoni upaparikkhitabbā we should accept the variant yoniso (“rationally”; literally “by way of source”), as also found at SN 22.95:2.1.
sn22.43:3.2: For “quenched in that respect” (tadaṅganibbuta) see AN 9.33 and AN 9.50.
